code: import React from"react";import EosLogo from"../Assets/eos-logo-horizontal.png";import AldLogo from"../Assets/ald-logo-horizontal.png";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PreparedBySelector(_ref){let{value,setValue}=_ref;const handleSelect=selectedValue=>{setValue(selectedValue);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"selector-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"button-group button-group-company",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleSelect("Eos Lightmedia"),className:value==="Eos Lightmedia"?"selected company-button":"company-button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:EosLogo,alt:"Eos Lightmedia",className:"company-logo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>handleSelect("Abernathy Lighting Design"),className:value==="Abernathy Lighting Design"?"selected company-button":"company-button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:AldLogo,alt:"Abernathy Lighting Design",className:"company-logo"})})]})});}export default PreparedBySelector;
